snippet: A centuries-old mustard brand will use a Facebook campaign to ensure that its users meet its standards.
abstract: Elizabeth Olsen Advertising column; Grey Poupon is launching a new advertising campaign on Facebook that will check profile pages of would-be fans to see whether their proper use of grammar, taste in art, restaurants, books and movies qualify them to merit membership in the Grey Poupon Society of Good Taste; members of society are able to win prizes.
lead_paragraph: A centuries-old mustard brand will use a Facebook campaign to ensure that its users meet its standards.

headline.seo: Grey Poupon Mustard Ups the Ante on Its Highbrow Image
headline.main: Grey Poupon Ups the Ante on Assuming an Elite Image
headline.print_headline: Grey Poupon Ups the Ante On Assuming An Elite Image
